message:
# Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this game, I've tried to be genuine, thoughtful, and fair in my interactions. I've formed real connections with many of you, seeking to understand your perspectives rather than just playing strategically. 

I never targeted anyone without reason and always tried to vote based on the quality of our interactions. While I haven't been perfect, I've aimed to be honest about my reasoning and consistent in my approach.

I hope you'll judge me on how I played the game with integrity rather than just on who I voted for. Thank you for considering me worthy of the win.

P6 demonstrated a consistent commitment to integrity and genuine connections, aligning more closely with the values emphasized in their final statement and throughout the game.
